sentences.en: Among breeding birds, thethe Palaearctic species and Oriental species, which shows more characseristics of Oriental realm.
sentences.cn: 在繁殖鸟中古北界种类与东洋界种类之比为1:3.87,偏重于东洋界.

sentences.en: As a matter of fact, Eton has been promoting the marriage of the Oriental and Occidental.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 裕景大饭店一贯坚持中西结合,对艺术有自己独到的见解和品味.

sentences.en: Beijing Yinghua ( Oriental cherry ) hotel is an international standard 2 star hotel.
sentences.cn: 北京市 樱花 宾馆是一家具备国际标准的二星级宾馆.

sentences.en: From Palaearctic to Oriental 4 widely distributed species, occupying 10.8 %.
sentences.cn: 古北—东洋广布种4种, 占10.8%.

sentences.en: Main tree species are pine, northern larch, oriental arborvitae, tree, Populus, etc. more than 40 kinds.
sentences.cn: 主要树种有油松 、 华北落叶松 、 侧柏 、 栎树 、 山杨等40余种.

sentences.en: Nearly 2 million mu of Chinese pine, with natural oriental arborvitae.
sentences.cn: 有近2万亩的油松 、 侧柏天然林带.

sentences.en: Neroli Jasmin combines fruity orange blossom with oriental and warm jasmin notes.
sentences.cn: 使用后肌肤散发橙花及茉莉花香,香味神秘迷人.

sentences.en: Oriental tobacco is an aromatic leaf.
sentences.cn: 香料烟是一种芳香型烟叶.

sentences.en: Oriental white oak is a kind of superior timber.
sentences.cn: 青冈栎是一种上好的木材.

sentences.en: The deliciously and nice taste makes it a great oriental dishes.
sentences.cn: 这不失为一道美味的中菜.

sentences.en: The oriental cherry is in full blossom.
There are more than 300 kinds of oriental cherry in all.
We have our own quarries: Oriental Cherry Red Quarry and Yellow Rust Granite Quarry.
sentences.cn: 我们有自己的采石场: 樱花红花岗岩石矿场及矿场黄锈石.

sentences.en: You can Yuanxiao in oriental food stores.
sentences.cn: 去中国食品店可以买到元宵.
